attributes.action: Take action on global warming NOW!
attributes.additional_details: Ice caps are melting fast, sea levels are rising fast, extreme weather the evidence is on the radio and the news!
attributes.background: Ice caps are melting and sea levels are rising and the only people who can do something about it us, EVERYONE but it seems people don’t see it as a big issue we need to clean the mess up we have made and take action before Mother Nature takes us!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about climate change, but we are not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might also like to sign one of these petitions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/230041
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231038 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234717 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231518
